nodes.label: User Query
nodes.description: User enters a message through chat interface

nodes.label: Chat Assistant Agent
nodes.description: Processes user queries with conversation context and generates responses

agents.name: Chat Assistant Agent
agents.description: Conversational AI agent that responds to user queries, maintains context across messages, and provides helpful, accurate, and friendly responses on a wide range of topics
agents.agent_goal: Provide helpful, accurate, and friendly responses to user queries while maintaining conversation context and ensuring a smooth, engaging chat experience
